extendedInfo.description: This game is a jigsaw puzzle with the most beautiful landscapes pictures. Complete the puzzles and unlock all the levels. You can also save the pictures as your wallpapers. 7 different difficulties could be chosen. Train your brain playing jigsaw puzzle games and have fun!************************************************************This application doesn't violate the copyright and doesn't claim to it. All the contents were collected from free sources.
